original_title: セーラー忍者かげちよ
overview: Kasumi, Lemon and Ranmaru are always there when they sense injustice. Together they are Ninja Girls Kagechiyo! When they see the mean Akane beat up poor Yumeno, they decide to do something. So take Yumeno under your wing to train her in all of the ninja techniques. Help for self-help, supported by their master Hattori.
title: Ninja Girls Kagechiyo
